## Tests for base_sig

Test that it can find the correct mean for site 1a

```{r base_sig_test_1, echo=T}
muss <- read.csv("muss.csv")
h<-base_sig(muss, frac)
if (mean(h[site=="1a"])==2.55)
{
  print("passed")
} else
{
  print("failed")
}
```
